**BismarkMerge2Files** Merges files generated by Bismark methylation extractor with parameters ”–bedGraph –CX -p”.
The output contains a coverage file, which contains the tab-separated columns: *chromosome*, *start_position*, *end_position*, *methylation_percentage*, *count_methylated* and *count_unmethylated*.

The input of *BismarkMerge2Files* are two bismark coverage files.

If you experience problems using *BismarkMerge2Files*, please contact_ us.

.. _contact: mailto:grau@informatik.uni-halle.de
